title: Council Decision of 29 April 2004 appointing members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
header:
13.5.2004 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 135/1
COUNCIL DECISION
of 29 April 2004
appointing members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency
(2004/C 135/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Atomic Energy Community, and in particular the second and third paragraphs of Article 54 thereof,
Having regard to Article X of the Statutes of the Euratom Supply Agency (1), as last amended by Decision 95/1/EC, Euratom, ECSC of 1 January 1995 (2),
Having regard to the Council Decision of 22 September 2003 appointing the members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency (3),
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Whereas:
(1) Several members' seats on the aforementioned Committee have become vacant following the appointments made by the Council in its Decision of 22 September 2003.
(2) Those vacancies should be filled.
(3) Having regard to the nominations submitted by the Italian Government on 15 January 2004,
main_body: Mr Raffaele DI SAPIA, Mr Angelo PAPA, Mr Lamberto MATEOCCI and Mr Roberto MUSSAPI are hereby appointed members of the Advisory Committee of the Euratom Supply Agency for the remainder of the Committee's term of office, i.e. until 28 March 2005.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 April 2004.
For the Council
The President
M. McDOWELL
(1)  OJ 27, 6.12.1958, p. 534/58.
(2)  OJ L 1, 1.1.1995, p. 1.
(3)  OJ C 232, 27.9.2003, p. 1.
